content: Carrie Fisher is the reason I’m considering ECT. I heard her talk about it openly years ago on a talk show. I’d always loved her, but I loved her more when she talked about her depression and treatment. After years of taking many different kinds of medication, I have reached a point where I’m considering other alternates. Carrie gave me that courage. And like you, I’ve been depressed all my life and am amazed I am still alive. We are survivors, you and I and Carrie and all those who suffer from mental illness. You article made me cry. Thank you for that.
